OOC: is my post right? If I'm breaking a rule told me and I'll re-post

Condor::

Condor peered around and after that walked to the map, he hoped that 
it showed him how left the ship.
He saw a way to left the ship, he left the place and came back to 
ladder, after that he took a corritor that lead towards the exit.
 
--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The hatch opened up, and as it opened, a large hum filled the room. 
As
> Condor peered in he could notice a lot of futuristic equipment, 
this was
> the engine room. There was a map of the base, to show where the 
power goes,
> beside a huge generator.
